name: Tap Cube
description:
NEWS

Update 1.0.3

▼ New Mode: Kids
Now children over 4 years can also have fun with Tap Cube! Just click on the KIDS cube and confirm! The difficulty will be adjusted!
▼ Ranking
Challenge your Facebook friends! A ranking is available to show who is better at Tap Cube!
▼ Interface
The interface design has been updated to enhance your experience.
▼ Adjusted difficulty
Tap Cube remains challenging in a fairer way!
▼ Bug fix
Little Bugs have been fixed.

//---

ATTENTION!!! You have 10 seconds to overcome each of the challenges of this bizzare cube.

Look closely at the image and try copying it as fast as you can, always adding extra time to the next goal! 
Be the Tap Cube champion and show your friends who is the best!

Game Features:
- Smart and challenging!
- Fun for any age!
- Stimulate your reasoning!
- Infinite fun!
